Movie_Name: Da hong deng long gao gao gua
Movie_Cast: Gong Li, Jingwu Ma, Saifei He, Cuifen Cao
Movie_Des: A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.

Movie_Cast: Paige O'Hara, Robby Benson, Jesse Corti, Rex Everhart
Movie_Des: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

Movie_Cast: Kevin Costner, Mary McDonnell, Graham Greene, Rodney A. Grant
Movie_Des: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Native Americans, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

Movie_Cast: Davor Dujmovic, Bora Todorovic, Ljubica Adzovic, Husnija Hasimovic
Movie_Des: In this luminous tale set in the area around Sarajevo and in Italy, Perhan, an engaging young Romany (gypsy) with telekinetic powers, is seduced by the quick-cash world of petty crime, which threatens to destroy him and those he loves.

Movie_Cast: Robin Williams, Robert Sean Leonard, Ethan Hawke, Josh Charles
Movie_Des: Maverick teacher John Keating uses poetry to embolden his boarding school students to new heights of self-expression.

Movie_Cast: Wil Wheaton, River Phoenix, Corey Feldman, Jerry O'Connell
Movie_Des: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

Movie_Cast: Charlie Sheen, Tom Berenger, Willem Dafoe, Keith David
Movie_Des: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

Movie_Cast: Yves Montand, Gérard Depardieu, Daniel Auteuil, Elisabeth Depardieu
Movie_Des: A greedy landowner and his backward nephew conspire to block the only water source for an adjoining property in order to bankrupt the owner and force him to sell.

Movie_Cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn, Paul Winfield
Movie_Des: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

Movie_Cast: Harry Dean Stanton, Nastassja Kinski, Dean Stockwell, Sam Berry
Movie_Des: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

Movie_Cast: Ben Kingsley, John Gielgud, Rohini Hattangadi, Roshan Seth
Movie_Des: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

Movie_Cast: Bertil Guve, Pernilla Allwin, Kristina Adolphson, Börje Ahlstedt
Movie_Des: Two young Swedish children in the 1900s experience the many comedies and tragedies of their lively and affectionate theatrical family, the Ekdahls.

Movie_Cast: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young, Edward James Olmos
Movie_Des: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

Movie_Cast: Alisa Freyndlikh, Aleksandr Kaydanovskiy, Anatoliy Solonitsyn, Nikolay Grinko
Movie_Des: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

Movie_Cast: Ingrid Bergman, Liv Ullmann, Lena Nyman, Halvar Björk
Movie_Des: A devoted wife is visited by her mother, a successful concert pianist who had little time for her when she was young.

Movie_Cast: Robert De Niro, Christopher Walken, John Cazale, John Savage
Movie_Des: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

Movie_Cast: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers
Movie_Des: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

Movie_Des: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit, but finds that his message may be difficult to control.

Movie_Cast: Sanjeev Kumar, Dharmendra, Amitabh Bachchan, Amjad Khan

Movie_Des: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

Movie_Cast: Paul Newman, George Kennedy, Strother Martin, J.D. Cannon
Movie_Des: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

Movie_Des: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

Movie_Des: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

Movie_Des: In 14th-century Sweden, an innocent yet pampered teenage girl and her family's pregnant and jealous servant set out from their farm to deliver candles to church, but only one returns from events that transpire in the woods along the way.

Movie_Des: Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a Tennessee science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

Movie_Des: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

Movie_Des: Lured by gold, two greedy peasants unknowingly escort a princess and her general across enemy lines.

Movie_Des: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

Movie_Cast: Giulietta Masina, François Périer, Franca Marzi, Dorian Gray
Movie_Des: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

Movie_Des: A war-hardened general, egged on by his ambitious wife, works to fulfill a prophecy that he would become lord of Spider's Web Castle.

Movie_Des: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

Movie_Des: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.

Movie_Des: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

Movie_Cast: James Cagney, Virginia Mayo, Edmond O'Brien, Margaret Wycherly
Movie_Des: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

Movie_Cast: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Alida Valli, Trevor Howard
Movie_Des: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

Movie_Cast: Anton Walbrook, Marius Goring, Moira Shearer, Robert Helpmann
Movie_Des: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

Movie_Name: The Best Years of Our Lives
Movie_Cast: Myrna Loy, Dana Andrews, Fredric March, Teresa Wright
Movie_Des: Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

Movie_Cast: Margaret Sullavan, James Stewart, Frank Morgan, Joseph Schildkraut
Movie_Des: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

Movie_Cast: Laurence Olivier, Joan Fontaine, George Sanders, Judith Anderson
Movie_Des: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

Movie_Cast: Henry Fonda, Jane Darwell, John Carradine, Charley Grapewin

Movie_Cast: Judy Garland, Frank Morgan, Ray Bolger, Bert Lahr
Movie_Des: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz, and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others' wishes.

Movie_Cast: James Stewart, Jean Arthur, Claude Rains, Edward Arnold
Movie_Des: A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his character.

Movie_Des: A renegade reporter trailing a young runaway heiress for a big story joins her on a bus heading from Florida to New York, and they end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops.

Movie_Name: All Quiet on the Western Front
Movie_Cast: Lew Ayres, Louis Wolheim, John Wray, Arnold Lucy
Movie_Des: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.

Movie_Cast: Charles Chaplin, Merna Kennedy, Al Ernest Garcia, Harry Crocker
Movie_Des: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

Movie_Name: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans
Movie_Cast: George O'Brien, Janet Gaynor, Margaret Livingston, Bodil Rosing
Movie_Des: A sophisticated urban woman seduces a farmer in the hopes that he will murder his neglected wife and join her in the city, but he soon finds himself rekindling his romance with the latter when she discovers their scheme.

Movie_Cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Neena Gupta, Gajraj Rao, Sanya Malhotra
Movie_Des: A man is embarrassed when he finds out his mother is pregnant.

Movie_Des: The story of Togo, the sled dog who led the 1925 serum run despite being considered too small and weak to lead such an intense race.

Movie_Cast: Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Rosemarie DeWitt, J.K. Simmons

Movie_Des: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.

Movie_Cast: Anne Dorval, Antoine Olivier Pilon, Suzanne Clément, Patrick Huard
Movie_Des: A widowed single mother, raising her violent son alone, finds new hope when a mysterious neighbor inserts herself into their household.

Movie_Cast: Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Idris Elba, Jenny Slate

Movie_Cast: Chloë Grace Moretz, James Caan, Mary Steenburgen, James Marsden

Movie_Des: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

Movie_Cast: Joaquin Phoenix, Amy Adams, Scarlett Johansson, Rooney Mara
Movie_Des: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

Movie_Cast: Rami Malek, Lucy Boynton, Gwilym Lee, Ben Hardy
Movie_Des: The story of the legendary British rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid (1985).

Movie_Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Will Poulter, Domhnall Gleeson
Movie_Des: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

Movie_Name: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
Movie_Cast: Logan Lerman, Emma Watson, Ezra Miller, Paul Rudd
Movie_Des: An introvert freshman is taken under the wings of two seniors who welcome him to the real world.

Movie_Des: After a prison riot, former-Captain Nascimento, now a high ranking security officer in Rio de Janeiro, is swept into a bloody political dispute that involves government officials and paramilitary groups.

Movie_Des: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.

Movie_Des: A newly unemployed cellist takes a job preparing the dead for funerals.

Movie_Cast: Natalie Portman, Mila Kunis, Vincent Cassel, Winona Ryder

Movie_Cast: Wagner Moura, André Ramiro, Caio Junqueira, Milhem Cortaz
Movie_Des: In 1997 Rio de Janeiro, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his position while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope visits.

Movie_Cast: Chiara Mastroianni, Catherine Deneuve, Gena Rowlands, Danielle Darrieux
Movie_Des: A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

Movie_Des: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

Movie_Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Djimon Hounsou, Jennifer Connelly, Kagiso Kuypers
Movie_Des: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

Movie_Des: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.
